column3: ACK. The issue here is that when automake encounters .mm files, it tags the final object as requiring an objective c++ linker. That shouldn't be a problem except that it doesn't communicate well with libtool.\n\nI still haven't dug into where the communication breakdown is. I suspect that either it tells libtool to use the OBJCXX tag which libtool doesn't understand, or that automake itself doesn'
